comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: I also support the OP. Links are dangerous nowadays, and no one can be sure that clicking on a hidden link will not get them into some kind of bizarre story. I always check the links that users provide on the forum, either by quoting them so that the link becomes visible or by opening it in another browser that is not associated with the forum.By the way, just today there was a discussion about how you can steal browser passwords by clicking on a fake link. Is everyone sure where they clicked? https://www.doyler.net/security-not-included/xss-password-stealing
